body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.30 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Mouse capture support in the Mac driver.
NTLM and Negotiate authentication in WinHTTP.
Support for proxy bypass in WinInet.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
